root: ^Goodday Sir, may I please trade in this gold bracelet for a few coins.
^I do not trade with foreigners. Try another stall Lady.
^Please, I promise you this bracelet is worth it, even if it is from a foreigner. .
^Fine, I'll give you 150 gold coins and nothing else!
^Nolwazi although infuriated, keeps her head an walks away with the Gold coins.
